description: Integrate Scholar outputs into a continuous plan/proposals loop with per-system health summaries

userStories.title: Define Scholar loop contract
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a loop contract that lists required artifacts, inputs, and consumers so every run is wired to improvements.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Artifacts, Inputs, Outputs, Consumers, Update Cadence
Explicitly describe how questions, proposals, gaps, digests, and system health feed the loop

userStories.title: Specify system health schema
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a clear schema for system health so each system summary is consistent and actionable.
acceptanceCriteria: Define required subsections: Summary Paragraph, Traits (bullets), Under Development (gaps), Planned Improvements (with rationale)
List systems to cover: Brain, Tutor, Scholar, Dashboard/Loop, Telemetry/Data

userStories.title: Produce system health report
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a system health report for each core system so weaknesses and improvements are explicit.
acceptanceCriteria: Include all five systems with the schema subsections
Cite evidence file paths inside each system section

userStories.title: Map questions lifecycle
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a full questions lifecycle map so I can see whether answers are used in the loop.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Generation, Storage, Answering Flow, Downstream Usage, Gaps/Disconnects
Reference file paths for storage and usage points

userStories.title: Map proposals lifecycle
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to see how proposals are created, approved, and used so I can confirm they drive improvements.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Drafting, Queueing (safe_mode), Approval/Rejection, Downstream Usage, Gaps
Reference promotion_queue and DB storage paths

userStories.title: Map digests lifecycle
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to know how digests are created and used so I can verify they influence the loop.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Generation, Save/Storage, Usage, Gaps
Reference digest files and any DB storage

userStories.title: Map gaps and improvement candidates lifecycle
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to understand how gaps become improvement candidates and where that chain breaks.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Gap Identification, Candidate Drafting, Prioritization, Usage
Reference gap_analysis and any improvement candidate artifacts

userStories.title: Describe health and research in the loop
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want clarity on how system health and research outputs drive questions and plans.
acceptanceCriteria: Explain how health summaries and research outputs generate questions and plan updates
Cite evidence paths for current health and research artifacts

userStories.title: Document Brain/Tutor ingest map
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a map of how Tutor data reaches Brain and Scholar so ingestion gaps are visible.
acceptanceCriteria: List data sources, hand-offs, and storage locations
Call out any missing instrumentation or unclear hand-offs

userStories.title: Document multi-agent operations
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a guide that explains how multi-agent runs work and how to verify parallel execution.
acceptanceCriteria: Describe parallelism, max_concurrency, and required prerequisites
Include verification steps for confirming parallel runs

userStories.title: Create no-input web research protocol
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a protocol for continuous web research without fresh input so Scholar can keep generating questions.
acceptanceCriteria: Define sources strategy, query cadence, and evidence logging
Describe how research results become new questions

userStories.title: Define question generation rubric
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a rubric for generating questions so new questions are consistent and actionable.
acceptanceCriteria: Include criteria, tagging, and thresholds for adding a question
Map question types to system traits and gaps

userStories.title: Create dashboard wiring checklist
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a checklist that shows which artifacts are only displayed vs actually used in the loop.
acceptanceCriteria: List each artifact (questions, proposals, digests, gaps, system health, plan) with display/use status
Highlight disconnects where artifacts are not feeding the loop

userStories.title: List loop integration gaps
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a focused list of loop integration gaps so fixes can be prioritized.
acceptanceCriteria: For each gap, include impact and evidence file paths
Group gaps by system (Brain, Tutor, Scholar, Dashboard/Loop, Telemetry/Data)

userStories.title: Build improvement candidates backlog
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a prioritized backlog of improvements tied to gaps so the plan has clear actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Include priority, effort, and impact for each candidate
Link each candidate to a specific gap

userStories.title: Create Scholar upgrade plan file
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a dedicated plan file that is overwritten each run and integrates all loop artifacts.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Inputs, Current State, System Summaries, Under Development, Planned Improvements (with rationale), Proposal Queue, Open Questions
Reference evidence artifacts produced in earlier stories

userStories.title: Create plan evidence index
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a concise index mapping plan sections to evidence artifacts so traceability is easy.
acceptanceCriteria: Map each plan section to supporting artifact file paths
Note any plan sections without evidence

userStories.title: Draft proposal pack for loop integration
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a proposal pack that queues concrete integration fixes for manual approval.
acceptanceCriteria: Include at least 3 proposals with fields: Proposal ID, Summary, Rationale, Expected Benefits, Risks, Required Changes (paths)
State that proposals require manual approval (safe_mode)

userStories.title: Define run cadence plan
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a run cadence plan so Scholar runs continuously without fresh input.
acceptanceCriteria: Include guidance for safe_mode and multi-agent usage

userStories.title: Write loop integration digest
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a digest that summarizes loop integration status and next actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Summarize key findings, top gaps, and planned improvements
Reference the plan file and proposal pack
